bodyweight_squats.name: Bodyweight Squats
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
Keep chest up and core engaged
Lower down until thighs are parallel to ground
Push through heels to return to start

pushups.name: Push-ups
instructions: Start in plank position, hands shoulder-width apart
Keep body in straight line from head to heels
Lower chest to ground, elbows at 45 degrees
Push back up to start position

plank.name: Plank Hold
instructions: Start in forearm plank position
Keep body straight, don't let hips sag
Hold position for specified time
Breathe steadily throughout

lunges.name: Walking Lunges
instructions: Step forward with one leg
Lower hips until both knees are at 90 degrees
Push through front heel to stand
Alternate legs

burpees.name: Burpees
instructions: Start standing, then drop to squat position
Kick feet back to plank position
Do a push-up
Jump feet forward and explode up with a jump

mountain_climbers.name: Mountain Climbers
instructions: Start in plank position
Bring one knee toward chest
Quickly switch legs
Continue alternating at fast pace

jumping_jacks.name: Jumping Jacks
instructions: Start standing with feet together
Jump feet out while raising arms overhead
Jump back to start position
Maintain steady rhythm

dumbbell_curls.name: Dumbbell Bicep Curls
instructions: Stand with dumbbells at sides, palms forward
Keep elbows stationary, curl weights up
Squeeze biceps at top
Lower with control

dumbbell_shoulder_press.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
instructions: Stand or sit with dumbbells at shoulder height
Press weights overhead until arms are straight
Lower with control to shoulders
Keep core engaged

dumbbell_rows.name: Dumbbell Bent Over Rows
instructions: Bend at hips with slight knee bend
Let dumbbells hang at arms length
Pull weights to sides of torso
Squeeze shoulder blades together at top

jump_rope.name: Jump Rope
instructions: Hold rope handles at sides
Swing rope overhead and jump as it passes under
Land softly on balls of feet
Maintain steady rhythm

tricep_dips.name: Tricep Dips
instructions: Sit on edge of bench, hands gripping edge
Slide forward so hips are off bench
Lower body by bending elbows to 90 degrees
Push back up to start

high_knees.name: High Knees
instructions: Run in place lifting knees high
Bring knees up to hip level
Pump arms vigorously
Maintain fast pace

side_plank.name: Side Plank
instructions: Lie on side, prop up on forearm
Stack feet and lift hips off ground
Keep body in straight line
Hold position, then switch sides

russian_twists.name: Russian Twists
instructions: Sit with knees bent, feet off ground
Lean back slightly, keep back straight
Rotate torso side to side
Touch ground on each side

wall_pushups.name: Wall Push-ups
instructions: Stand arm's length from wall
Place hands on wall at shoulder height
Bend elbows to lean toward wall
Push back to start position

chair_squats.name: Chair Squats
instructions: Stand in front of chair
Lower down until touching chair
Stand back up without using hands
Keep weight in heels

step_ups.name: Step-Ups
instructions: Place one foot on bench or step
Push through heel to step up
Bring other leg to bench
Step back down and alternate

leg_raises.name: Leg Raises
instructions: Lie on back, hands under hips
Lift legs straight up to 90 degrees
Lower slowly without touching ground
Keep lower back pressed to floor

bicycle_crunches.name: Bicycle Crunches
instructions: Lie on back, hands behind head
Bring opposite elbow to opposite knee
Extend other leg straight
Alternate sides in cycling motion
